Ferox BPO (540m NPC price) for 469m each - 5x minimum (as for all bulk trades)
Brutix BPO (570m NPC price) for 489m each - 5x minimum

Mix and match is allowed.

Located in Jita 4/4, or 1 jump out at a system/station of your choice.

These are untouched BPOs that can be sold on the market. I recommend flipping them on the market now, or in the future for a few mil under NPC if you are a more patient player. These were personal investments, but I have a 100B loan due next week and am willing to let someone else take the remaining profit on this investment.

Mail or convo for orders and questions, thank you.

-mechtech

From: Servjen
Sent: 2013.07.08 13:03
To:

As titel sais, i want to sell hybrid ammo BPO's

They come as a pack with the sizes S, M, L.
All the sizes contain the following charge types:

Antimater
Iridium
Iron
Lead
Plutonium
Thorium
Tungsten
Uranium


Their ME/PE is 250/150.

Prise is set at 150m.
There are six (6) packs to be sold for the special deal of buy six (6) and pay five (5) price of 750m (original price of six is 900m)

Location is Jita.

They only will be sold as one whole pack. Nothing will be broken up.

Contact me to make an order.

https://forums.eveonline.com/default.aspx?g=posts&t=256864&find=unread
